UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: First vertebrate BRICHOS antimicrobial peptides: β-hairpin host defense peptides in limbless amphibia lung resemble those of marine worms.
Literature.Author: Smetanin RV, Sukhareva MS, Vladimirova EV, Zharkova MS, Mikushina AD, Komlev AS, Khaydukova MM, Filatenkova TA, Kalganova AI, Pipiya SO, Terekhov SS, Orlov DS, Shamova OV, Eliseev IE

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human umbilical vein cells EA.hy926:IC50=27.1±2.5 µM,Human dermal fibroblasts:IC50=>100 µM,Human PBMC:IC50=44.7±0.3 µM,Human erythrocytes:30% Hemolysis=>100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ESBL 521/17(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 7226/16(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ESBL 344/17(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus 1399/17(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=1µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=>100µM),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(IC50=72.1±6.5µM)
